deleteModal.cautionText: If you delete this restaurant now:
consequences: All restaurant data will be permanently deleted
All transaction history will be lost
All user accounts will be deleted

googleReviews.title: Google Reviews
googleReviews.subtitle: Configure Google Reviews link for {{name}}
googleReviews.setupTitle: Set up Google Review link for {{name}}
googleReviews.step2Title: Search under "Find the ID of a particular place"
googleReviews.step2Description: Type "{{name}}" and select the correct result
googleReviews.step3Description: This appears below the map (e.g.: ChIJN1t_tDeuEmsRU...)
googleReviews.step4Description: Replace only "PLACE_ID" with the copied ID from {{name}}
googleReviews.canChangeLabel: The restaurant can always change this later
googleReviews.successMessage: Review link added! Customers of {{name}} will receive a review request after payment.

guide.title: Onboarding Guide
guide.description: Forgot how onboarding works? Check the step-by-step guide.

welcome.title: Welcome to Splitty Onboarding!
welcome.subtitle: Let's get {{restaurantName}} ready for the future of restaurant payments

personnel.title: Personnel
personnel.description: Configure access for the restaurant team

payments.title: Payments
payments.description: Set up Stripe for the restaurant

personnel.title: Step 1: Restaurant Team
personnel.subtitle: Add at least one manager to continue
personnel.tipMessage: Add at least one manager. You can always add more users later through user management.

stripe.title: Step 2: Stripe Connect
stripe.subtitle: Configure payment processing for the restaurant

integration.title: Stripe Connect Integration
integration.description: Stripe Connect enables the restaurant to securely receive payments. The restaurant manages their own Stripe account and receives payouts directly.
integration.connectDescription: The restaurant will set up their own Stripe account

success.title: Stripe Successfully Connected!
success.description: Payment processing is now configured for {{restaurantName}}

stripe.tipConnected: Stripe is connected and ready. You can continue to the next step.
stripe.tipNotConnected: Connect Stripe to enable payment processing for this restaurant.

pos.title: Step 3: POS System Connection
pos.subtitle: Configure the POS system for {{restaurantName}} for automatic synchronization

qrHolders.title: Step 4: QR holders
qrHolders.subtitle: Configure QR stands and table layout for {{restaurantName}}
qrHolders.selectPerSection: Choose a design for each section below
qrHolders.totalTablesDesc: Automatically calculated based on all sections

floorPlan.title: Floor Plan Upload (Optional)
floorPlan.uploadText: Drag files here or click to upload
floorPlan.fileTypes: PNG, JPG, PDF - Max 5MB per file - Multiple files allowed
floorPlan.description: Upload floor plans, photos or documents of the restaurant (multiple files allowed)

notes.label: Notes (Optional)
notes.placeholder: Add any comments or special instructions here...
notes.helpText: For example: special QR holder requests, unusual table layouts, seasonal terraces, etc.

googleReviews.title: Step 5: Google Reviews
googleReviews.subtitle: Configure Google Reviews link for {{restaurantName}}
googleReviews.setupTitle: Set up Google Review link for {{restaurantName}}
googleReviews.step2: Search under "Find the ID of a particular place"
googleReviews.step2Desc: Type "{{restaurantName}}" and select the correct result
googleReviews.step3Desc: This appears below the map (e.g.: ChIJN1t_tDeuEmsRU...)
googleReviews.step4Desc: Replace only "PLACE_ID" with the copied ID from {{restaurantName}}
googleReviews.canChangeLabel: The restaurant can always change this later
googleReviews.successMessage: Review link added! Customers of {{restaurantName}} will receive a review request after payment

telegram.title: Step 6: Telegram Notifications
telegram.subtitle: Set up payment notifications for {{restaurantName}}

step1.title: Verify Restaurant Name
step1.description: Type the restaurant name to confirm

step2.title: Create Telegram Group
step2.description: We'll create a dedicated notification group for this restaurant

step3.title: Join Group & Share Link
step3.description: Join the group and share the invite link with restaurant staff

telegram.successMessage: Telegram notifications configured! Payment notifications for {{restaurantName}} will be sent to this group
